attributes.action: HELP AFCWIMBLEDON TO OVER TURN THEFA AN  RYMAN LEAGUES 18 POINTS DEDUCTION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE RYMAN LEAGUE HAVE PUNHISHED US FOR FIELDING A WRONG PLAYER WHICH TOOK THEM 11 GAMES TO FIND OUT IF THIS WAS A BIG FOOTBALL CLUB THIS PUNISHMENT WOULD NOT HAVE BEEN SO HIGH OR IF ANY PUNISHMENT FROM A SIMPLE ADMIN MISTAKE IN WHICH WE HAD A PLAYER WE BOUGHT FROM CARDIFF AN HE NEVER HAD INTERNATIONAL CLERENCE. WHY SHOULD HE NEED CLEARENCE WHEN CARDIFF PLAY IN THE ENGLISH FOOTBALL LEAGUE

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
